title: Split vim subdirectory into own repository
body:
by **stonkajr**: 
Many people (including me) keep 'dotfiles' repositories with various useful stuff. One
of the type of files is all the vim plugins in one place, this is very easy if you use
pathogen and subrepositories/modules.
But including whole go repo just to have vim syntax is a bit overkill. There are many
unofficial attempts, like:
https://github.com/uggedal/go-vim
https://github.com/anzaika/go.vim
https://github.com/fsouza/go.vim
but they are updated (I guess) manually and can easily get out of date.
Would you be willing to keep the vim files in separate repo and maybe link as a subrepo
from main (or even not, not everyone uses vim, so maybe no need of it in main repo?)
Best,
